page.title: 06Roehampton (3) Estates(cont)
page.content: Alton West's famous housing blocks are fine, mighty concrete slabs set on stilts at right angles to the park so as not to be too obtrusive. The architects were influenced by Swedish design and Le Corbusier's idea of a city of towers standing in Parkland. A different building was designed for each dwelling type.41% is 1-2 bedrm. flats; 12% is 2 bedrm.maisonettes;31% is 3 bedrm.maisonettes; 14% is 3-4 bedrm. houses; 2% is 1 room old people's dwellings. The focal point of the contrasting neighbourhoods is the junction of Danebury Avenue, Roehampton Lane*,High Street. There is no real community centre, just a busy parade of shops, a boy's club, library and High Street. A busy main through road* divides Roehampton geographically and socially. Local industries are K.L.G. and 2 limb-fitters. (cont.over)
